description:
Single storey outbuilding in rear garden (retrospective)
ancillary to the main dwelling house
decision_conditions:
<p><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">The outbuilding hereby permitted shall remain incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwelling house of&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">9 Heather Way, Harrow Weald, Stanmore, Harrow,
HA7 3RD,</span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;</span>and shall not at any time be used as primary residential accommodation.&nbsp;</span></p>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The windows in the eastern and southern elevations of the proposed development shall be of purpose-made obscure glass and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
